amendment.description: To make available from Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide, an additional amount of up to $7,500,000 for the Joint Advertising, Market Research and Studies program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4779 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4779 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S8599; text: CR S8599) To make available from Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide, an additional amount of up to $7,500,000 for the Joint Advertising, Market Research and Studies program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4779 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4779 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Warner.
